text: Suddenly, the big bad wolf came upon the first little pig’s house. He knocked on the door. ‘Little pig, little pig, let me come in! Or I’ll huff and I’ll puff and I’ll blow your house down!’ called the wolf. The little pig felt safe in his house so he shouted back, ‘Not by the hair on my chinny chin chin!’.
